One movie that fits the user's preferences is "The Shawshank Redemption". This classic drama follows the life of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is convicted of murder and sent to Shawshank State Penitentiary.

Andy befriends another inmate named Red, who has been in prison for many years. Together, Andy and Red come up with creative ways to pass the time, such as writing letters to family members who are far away from home.

Despite being in prison for so long, Andy never loses hope that one day he will be able to leave prison and start a new life.

One of the things that makes "The Shawshank Redemption" such a great movie is the way that it shows how even when we feel like our lives have no meaning at all, there is still always something that can give us just a little bit more hope than we already have.
